thread.title: XShot Sponsors IZEAfest 2015 and Gives Away the New XShot Deluxe Selfie Kit to Blogging
thread.title_full: XShot Sponsors IZEAfest 2015 and Gives Away the New XShot Deluxe Selfie Kit to Blogging

title: XShot Sponsors IZEAfest 2015 and Gives Away the New XShot Deluxe Selfie Kit to Blogging
text: XShot Sponsors IZEAfest 2015 and Gives Away the New XShot Deluxe Selfie Kit to Blogging , 1 October 2015 -- XShot is proud to sponsor IZEAfest for the second time, and to engage with other entrepreneurs, brands and social media creatives, in such a fun and collaborative environment from October 22-24 at Walt Disney World Resort.Santa Barbara, CA, USA, October 01, 2015 -- Some of the biggest names in the blogosphere, top creators and brands will be convening at IZEAfest 2015 from October 22-24 at Walt Disney World Resort in Lake Buena Vista, Florida. The interactive event connects social media experts with the latest trends – including the XShot camera extender, which has proven its popularity among bloggers and social media enthusiasts for its ability to enhance their everyday life - for both work and play. Originally designed to help people photograph themselves without the inevitable arm extension, the XShot camera extender was the first selfie stick launched in 2007 in the U.S., and has captured the attention of bloggers and social media audiences, due to its versatility and added functionality including special effects for self-portraits and video diaries. XShot also developed several accessories to help bloggers and content creators to capture the moment or work at their desk or outdoors, like suction cups, phone holders and many adapters. XShot is proud to sponsor IZEAfest for the second time, and to engage with other entrepreneurs, brands and social media creatives, in such a fun, vibrant and collaborative environment. At IZEA Fest, a new XShot Selfie Kit with a Bluetooth remote and universal phone holder will be given away to each participant, in all new vibrant colors. People will be encouraged to share their photos on twitter, Instagram and Facebook with #xshotizea.“Ted Murphy and his IZEA Insiders have been great fans and friends of XShot since the beginning, and it had been a blast to be part of the first IZEAfest in 2009. They were quick to see the potential of the Camera Accessory for their blogging and personal needs and we are thrilled to be part of the new event and unveil some great new accessories” said Michael Shepard, president of XShot. IZEA Fest 2015 Speakers include: Mario Lopez, Pam Harris , Lewis Broadnax , Dave Peck , Jake Lestan , Justin Godley, Kip Edwardson, Lee Gordon, Fik-Shun, John & Whitney Spinks, Heather Taylor, Suzanne Fanning, Susan Borst, Andy Brownell, Andrew Bazzi, Rajiv Dhall, Nick Evans, John Rife, Carl Childers, Laura Fuentes, James Hills, Nadia Aly, Jennifer Burg, Chris Ashbach, Jana O’Brien, Jason Baldridge, Simon T. Bailey, Scott Stratten, Joel Comm, Nicole Paris, Ted Murphy About XShot: XShot INC is a leading innovator since 2007 in the camera accessory market. XShot produces the popular telescopic camera extenders that attach to any smartphones and to any compact digital camera or GoPro, so that the photographer can be a part of the picture or video too. Everyday videographers and photographers no longer have to try and stretch their arms as far as possible to get in a picture, let alone capture the full background. XShot camera accessories are precision-engineered devices that are durable and compact, and have become popular with sports athletes, travelers, social media users, bloggers, outdoor lovers and families. Whether seeking self-portraits, blog or video diaries, the XShot brings a fresh, new focus to the future of photography and Social Media. Contact:
